Verocity Polygraph Services

Polygraphs

Polygraph examinations vary greatly based on each case. Mike uses the high quality LX4000 computer polygraph system. This systems records, stores and analyzes physiological changes during the polygraph examination. The LX4000 system combines conventional procedure with a sophisticated state of the art computer. Your examination will be audio and video recorded. Each examination is done by Mike Anderson and is 100% confidential.

Fees for Polygraph services are charged on a per case basis. For more information, you can contact Mike Anderson and his team.
